div.head: Description of changes for 2012.05
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft built from a copy of a descriptive transcription of the Reims manuscript. Additions and corrections still need to be made and are pending a collation comparision of the oavailable manuscript witnesses. Some cross-references have been added, but citations and a critical apparatus still await construction.
